title: Rob Ferretti
description: What do you do after you've done countless road rallies and ran a successful exotic car rental company? You do crazy things in cheap beater cars. That's what our friend, Rob Ferretti, does. We couldn't believe the quality of cars he bought, and what he did to them in Florida. Wow.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
